original_text: He continues to enjoy wicked things, like the taste of sweet food that he keeps in his mouth. He continues to enjoy wicked things,
korean_text: 아껴서 버리지 아니하고 입천장에 물고 있을지라도

sentences.original_text: He continues to enjoy wicked things
like the taste of sweet food
that he keeps in his mouth
He continues to enjoy wicked things
